description: This file contains C source code implementing JSON query functionality, including parsing JSON files, navigating JSON objects with paths, searching arrays and objects, and providing command-line interface for querying JSON data.

methods.name: cJSON * cJSON_Search(cJSON const * json,char const * path)
methods.description: Searches for a JSON element based on a given path, supporting nested keys and array indices.

methods.name: cJSON * cJSON_SearchFile(char const * fname,char const * path)
methods.description: Reads a JSON file from disk and searches for a specific element within it based on the path.

methods.name: int is_index(char const * s)
methods.description: Determines if a string is a numeric index and parses it into an integer.

ctags.name: cJSON_Search
ctags.pattern: /^static cJSON* cJSON_Search(cJSON const* json, char const* path)$/

ctags.name: cJSON_SearchFile
ctags.pattern: /^static cJSON* cJSON_SearchFile(char const* fname, char const* path)$/
